name: Ultra Laser Rocket
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam. So its really limited and buggy.

Fight your way through hordes of space Jellies and 'Flammies' with your ultra laser as you zoom about space.

This games is semi-finished. Its playable but not much content... Like there's NO music... at all...

Controls:

Up arrow(hold down) Accelerate,
(double tap) Boost/Immunity,
(release) Fire LaserLeft & Right arrowsTurn rocket

Fonts used:

Minecraft - http://www.dafont.com/minecraft.font
